title: New: How To Dress Well – Cold Nites
content:
Still my most anticipated release of 2012, How To Dress Well’s Total Loss could well have the effect that Bon Iver’s sophomore record had for Vernon & Co, propelling him to worldwide fame.

New cut Cold Nites is a majestically beautiful track, heading towards his R&B roots sprinkled with his own untouchable aurora. Check it out below, and pre-order Total Loss here released 17 September..
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
